TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Prompt extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 可以呈現什麼的資訊，文字或音訊檔案。

span.span: Represents information about what can be rendered, either text or an audio file, by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件可以包含純文字，以標記語言或音訊檔案格式的文字。A object can contain plain text, text formatted with markup language, or audio files. 空白與每個新執行個體建立物件。An empty object is created with each new instance of . 類別會提供方法，來加入內容，包括文字、 SSML 標記、 書籤，以及預錄的音訊檔案 （例如.wav 檔案） 的空它所包含的物件。The class provides methods for adding content, including text, SSML markup, bookmarks, and prerecorded audio files (such as .wav files), to the empty object that it contains. 應用程式通常會使用，而非物件，建立提示，並填入內容。Typically, applications will use , rather than a object, to create prompts and populate them with content. 若要產生語音內容物件，請使用方法。To generate speech from the contents of a object, use the method.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder promptBuilder) cil managed

summary.span: 從 物件建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class from a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string textToSpeak) cil managed

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體，並指定要讀出的文字。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be spoken.

span.span: A value that specifies the format of the text.

summary.span: 建立類別的新執行個體，並指定要讀出的文字，以及它的格式是純文字或標記語言。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be spoken and whether its format is plain text or markup language.

value.span: 如果已完成提示，則傳回 ，否則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the prompt has completed; otherwise .
